website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning teething toy that has a lot to offer. The best value for money.
pros: Loops are pliable, easy to grip, and safe to chew on
Center cube acts as a rattle, allowing babies to explore sound
Vibrant colors are attractive and engaging
Can be refrigerated for cooling relief
cons: Loops easily reach side and back teeth, but biting down with the front may be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Grows mold! Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of the great reviews that this product received. We had this for a good two weeks until we realized that it was growing black and white mold! The wires are hollow in the middle, and at the center of the whole toy, these wires meet. There are gaps in between where the wire and square meets, so definitely a great breeding ground for bacteria and mold! I was hoping it was sealed and solid, but that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old son LOVES this toy! It is great for his teething and he can hold on to it easily. Even throw it across the room, haha! Update: My son is now 6 months old and still loves this toy. It is the first toy he became actively engaged in and began grabbing with two hands. Great to encourage him for some fun tummy time. Still loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Sgt.Ogre

customer_reviews.title: Really engaging toy that will encourage 2 handed play.
customer_reviews.text: This toy drew my sons attention right away. I gave it to him when he was about 3 months old (he's just over 4 months old now) and it really encouraged 2 handed play. It rattles just enough and he loves chewing on it too. This toy goes everywhere with us and I just use some plastic links to attach it to the stroller belt so it doesn't get dropped. It can't really be sanitized (I saw from other melted reviews) and it doesn't come with any cleaning instructions. I assume it cannot be submerged either so I've been cleaning it with a cloth and mild soapy warm water.
customer_reviews.author: V. Castle

customer_reviews.title: Mold alert!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy will grow mold!! (See attached pics) Purchased this 7 month ago, used it for couple months. Washed and put it away,only to find mold spot, terrible and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A good beginner's toy.
customer_reviews.text: This has been recommended to me by many moms as a good early toy/teether. My daughter had gotten bored of looking at the hanging toys from her bouncer and wanted something different. The toy is small and light enough for them to practice gross motor skills in grabbing, moving, and holding. Due to the shape, it prevents gagging as they can't shove it down their throat like some other teethers. It's easy to rinse off and wipe down and I can see her using it for a good while. I introduced it to her at 2 and half months and now at 3mo she is grabbing a lot more and likes to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sinaxis

customer_reviews.title: Great sensory toy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toy. My daughter can sit and play with this for a while without getting bored. She continually tries to get the little square in the center and loves that it makes a rattle sound. I gave this toy to her at about 3 months and it helped her to learn how to pass from each hand with control. It also is sensory with all the loops and colors. I will be saving this for the next little one!
customer_reviews.author: Coco Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great for us
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter really loved her OBall, so we got this Winkle (the name makes us laugh every time....). She enjoyed this just as much as her OBall, if not more because she can chew on it. She couldn't care less about the fact that it rattles, but we knew that wasn't what we were getting it for. We'd still buy it again. **Even though this worked for us, we bought it AFTER knowing what types of things our daughter enjoyed. If she didn't enjoy toys like this we wouldn't have bought it. Hint Hint!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Of Sharon Rice

customer_reviews.title: Better rattle than teething toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is not really a fan of this toy. She will chew on it if you put it in her mouth but some of the loops press against her nose and face while she has one of the rings in her mouth. I think it would be better as a rattle than a teething toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Iceman

customer_reviews.title: The "Atom" for every baby!!
customer_reviews.text: This "atom" was the first toy my son could pick up and grip on his own at a very early age. I didn't have to worry about safety or minimum age requirements. He's now 8.5 months and still loves it! I've since bought about 4 more of these for all of my friends and family who have young babies or are pregnant. I also shared it with my mom group and everyone purchased it for their littles ones when they were itty bitty. My parents just told me they bought it for their friend who's a new grandparent and I realized, I need to write a review for this amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dav

customer_reviews.title: Unique and wonderful teething, dexterity toy.
customer_reviews.text: The bright colors are lively and the design invites instant eye-catching attempt for my nephew to grab and play with when he was a mere 2 months old. Yep at first he tossed it about, squeezed it (the rings collapse inside each other when squeezed). He was so used to playing with it, when tooth growth/gum irritation began, into the mouth, he naturally put it in his mouth, gumming it. His mom bought other teethers but my nephew gravitated toward this unique toy/teething comforting choice. I'm not surprised at all that the product had received many awards/ industry accolades for design and purpose. I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: raggs

customer_reviews.title: My puppy thinks this is the bees knees
customer_reviews.text: This toy was so perfect for a puppy. It's interactive, it teaches them to hold things and it's tough! I needed something that would hold the attention of a 12 week old puppy. To my surprise, my 1yo dog and 5yo dog play with it too. It rattles, it's tough for chewing, it great for teething and it's mostly colors that dogs can see. If it is half as good for babies, it is one of the greatest toys of all time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rudnicki

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor even after was washed twice
customer_reviews.text: This toy has strong chemical odor even after washing twice.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy that grows with baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy. It is colorful, light therefore easy to hold and makes a sound. We introduced it when he was 3 months old and he was able to grasp it in his tiny hands and wave it around. During tummy time, we place the toy in front of him and he would try reach and grab it. Now that he is older, it is a great chew toy, he loves biting it and holding it in his mouth. Since it is plastic, it is easy to clean with hot soapy water. Overall great toy for growing infant and since it is light, we would bring it with us on the go to keep him entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Sze

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT toy to help baby grow dexterity skills.
customer_reviews.text: As a new, first-time mom, I was getting so frustrated that all of the toys I seemed to be buying for my baby girl didn't seem to be the right ones... she couldn't grip any of them, not even the teethers, or the rattles, etc. I was finding. A friend recommended this type of toy and INSTANTLY, my 4 month old was finally able to hold onto a toy and enjoy it! At 5 months now, she uses it every day and loves the colors and the slight rattle that is built in. It's easy for her to grip and move from hand to hand. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Minnemama2017

customer_reviews.title: Came with film of white powder
customer_reviews.text: This toy came with a film of white powder. It was placed in the box without any plastic wrapping or covering. I'm hesitant to give this to my child, even after cleaning. For $11, I expect not to have this issue. Also, the purple bands pictured are actually pink.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: My child's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this toy for about a week now for my 2.5 month old. The moment we handed it to him, he immediately grabbed it and put it in his mouth. It's very easy for him to hold, and the colors are really attractive. The rattle is not too loud which is alright, plus, doesn't seem to care much for the rattle sound anyways. It's easy to clean as we just run it under hot water. It's a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Kravat

customer_reviews.title: hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this, my son did not like it at all. All the teether are too small for him to bite on. It's also extremely hard to clean and keep it clean. It was a waste of money for us. Wish we could return it.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: 0/2 kids liked this. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this twice, for both of my kids. TO ME, it looks like a fun, exciting, well-made toy. It’s so colorful! It has so many parts to grab onto! It rattles! I have no idea why, but neither of my kids have been the least bit interested in this toy. I’ve tried it at different ages. They won’t touch it. If I give it to them they set it down. Maybe your child will like this better. It seems like a cool toy. There are so many toys out there that I definitely wouldn’t bother with it again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kerby

customer_reviews.title: Nice but was melted
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like it would be a good toy but was melted. Good weight and had a rattle. The box was not damaged so it was packaged like this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter gets very frustrated after 10 mins
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter has a love/hate relationship with this toy. She's 5 mo and gets very excited about it, it's fun and easy for her to grab, but when she tries to bite she can't seem to get it to do whatever she's going for. This happens EVERY time. I think the problem is that at her age the teeth are coming out of the front and this teether works on the molar areas. It's a great toy and she loves it, but after 10 mins or so I have to take it from her so she'll stop rage screaming and give her something else haha
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My daughters absolute favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN FAVORITE TOY! My four month old daughter is obsessed with this toy! It is perfect for grabbing and bringing towards her mouth. It will keep her entertained for 30 minutes at a time and I think it really helped her start to grab. We wash it with her bottles in baby dish soap and let it air dry. The rattle is not too loud and the she loves the colors. Would recommend hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L.

customer_reviews.title: LO loves it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I should have purchased it earlier! My baby loves playing with it every since the first day I introduced to her. I subscribed for toy boxes, those ones where they send you a toy box every 2 months, so she has a lot of toys already. Although she like playing with those toys too, but she absolutely loves this manhattan ball! She will coordinate her hands to hold it and put it in her mouth, I hold it in distance and it encourage her to reach for it. Definitely worth a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who LOVES to chew cords. I've tried about every cat chew toy out there, but none of them were "cords" and the ones she did like, she would only chew if I was holding it because otherwise it layed flat on the ground. This toy is perfect! It's cord-like and she'll chew on it without me holding it because the tubes hold themselves up. She'll have something to chew while I'm at work and hopefully lay off my cords! And it's much safer! I'll be buying more of these - one for each room!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! I bought it as a new toy for the plane, I hooked it to a pacifier clip so it wouldn't fall on the ground. She continues to play with it at home. Passing it between hands, shaking it, chewing on it and looking at it. Only thing is the little rattle in the middle shouldn't be submerged in water, that's my preferred way of cleaning toys so I dunk it in and quickly take it out so water doesn't get trapped in the cube rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething babies
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 month old and she loves it. It’s easy for her to grab and hold, and it rattles when you shake it. It’s colorful and beautiful and great for babies to chew on
customer_reviews.author: Michele McGuff

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this toy. I saw that my 3 month old was starting to grasp things and starting to put things into his mouth. I saw this toy on Amazon and wanted to get it. I'm really glad I did. He absolutely loves it. It's so great for them to grip...it's has so many options for them to hold it the way it's designed. And then he also puts part of it in mouth which is great for when he starts teething. I really recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Arok5

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product it got my carpet all dirty as well
customer_reviews.text: After two days of my child using this product. It started leaking and I had to throw it out! Stay away from this product it got my carpet all dirty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elibeli2

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for teething babies for front teeth
customer_reviews.text: My baby hated this toy. He gets so upset he cant bite it because the wires do go to his front gums. He is teething with his front teeth so he gets so mad because its hard for him to position the wires to his gums for him to bite.
customer_reviews.author: Agila09

customer_reviews.title: Cute intricate toy, great for exploration and teething
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, colorful toy. Just what I was looking for to give a 1-year-old to ease his teething and keep him occupied. Let Amazon donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. Check out how Amazon Smile works at  My shopping is donating to my favorite charity, Canines for Independence at no cost to me. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: 📚 Bookwyrm 📚Top Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: Loving Manhattan Toys!
customer_reviews.text: Since I found my baby loves this ball I started looking at Manhattan Toys and I'm in love with the brand. The ball is super easy to grab for those first months that your baby is starting grabbing things but easy to drop them. From all the toys she owned (like 3 actually) she looooves this one, the raddle is not noisy, easy to clean, easy to grab, easy to chew. Cute, unique and affordable toys, from now and then I always look my options with that brand first than with others.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: NOT JUST FOR HUMANS
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8 week old Pomeranian. I wasted a lot money trying to find a dog chew toy small enough for her little mouth. They were all just too bulky. Then I got the brilliant idea to order a human baby teething toy. Oh joy!!! We have so much fun with this thing. She can play quietly with it, or we can play tug of war. Maybe the best is I can roll it across the floor and she can pick it up and bring it back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Logos

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I like this Manhattan toy. It’s easy to clean. Full of colors. And it rattles. So you can say it’s a complete developmental toy for your little one. My only disappointment is that my baby couldn’t use it as teething toy as it doesn’t work for the front teeth. May be because she is small right now. She will learn how to use it as a teether as she grows. Otherwise it’s a good purchase. And I also wants to mention that the product arrived on time even in this pandemic situation.
customer_reviews.author: Pritesh

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toy for a 6 mo old. My son did not especially like it nor did he like chewing it especially. The tubes are made of hard plastic which is not always what babies are looking for to calm their gums. He does grab it once in a while, but never for more than 1 minute or so. I don't think it is worth the $10+ they are selling it for. If you want a really good chew toy, try the Baby Banana. They call it a training toothbrush, but it is a chew. My son always chews on it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Homecenter

customer_reviews.title: We love this toy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 4 month old. She was just starting to grasp things but still not wonderful at it. She was able to grab this toy easily, and enjoyed chewing on it, as it is a softer material (but still solid). I saw a review that the toy is not sealed, so if submerged could get water inside. I don't foresee needing to submerge it to clean, as only some parts of it get wet at a time. I wipe it off every few days with a damp cloth if needed. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The must-have baby toy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the o-ball for my first baby because it was one of the first things she could grasp. However, I discovered this toy when I had my second baby and it is even better. It is easy for a baby to hold, but also can act as a teether (as opposed to the round design of the o-ball). I love the flexible, lightweight tubing that it is constructed out of; baby can knock himself in the face without getting hurt. The colors are bright and it was the first 'toy'/teether that my baby enjoyed!
customer_reviews.author: TheAshinator

customer_reviews.title: Great for those just learning to hold things and need something to teeth on
customer_reviews.text: My 3month old loves this! Gave this to her at 2 1/2 months when she started to hold things and it was so easy for her to grip and bring along with her. Great for teething, the tubes are soft but still firm (not squishy) and has a rattle that makes a light noise
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My baby LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: My five month old loves this! I love the colours, the fact that they are not the basic boring primary colours but still bright and vivid. I love that it is easy to grasp at this stage unlike some of his other toys. It is pliable so he can put it in his mouth and when he bangs it on his head by accident he does not cry. On top of all that it is a still a rattle that makes a noise (not loud and annoying but just right) when he shakes it. I am looking forward to seeing how he plays with it when he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Jeela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product is recalled by company related to the plastic pieces breaking off and posing a choking hazard!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Genereaux

customer_reviews.title: Fun brightly colored baby toy
customer_reviews.text: Neat little baby toy that is easy for little hands to grab and shake. This is one of the first toys that my little one could grab, put in their mouths, and wave around. I've also given it as a shower gift and it is a fun, bright colorful addition to any gift. It has nice soft rubber for little hands to grab and a discreet rattle. It is best for babies who are at an age where they are enjoying playing on a play mat and doing tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Easy for newly-discovered-hands to grasp!
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself is very well made, colorful, and smooth. There is no rough edging or ridged teething section, simply just the smooth edges of the toy’s loops and twists. My four month old started enjoying this toy about a month ago and it has stayed a fan-favorite in this house. I know that is states you can put it in the fridge for a cold toy to relieve teething pain, but it BARELY gets cold and I’m too scared to freeze it (for safety reasons.) Not a deal breaker for me though. Recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my son was 2 months old. He liked to look at it during Tummy Time and the rattle helps calm him down when he starts fussing. He’s now 3 months and will grab it on his own and mouth it. I’ve only ever cleaned it by wiping it down. It doesn’t look like the holes are sealed where the rings enter the square so I’m concerned about water getting in if I were to rinse it. No big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Entertains enough
customer_reviews.text: 4 month old likes it, she plays with it, tosses it around. But maybe not interactive enough because it doesn’t entertain her as long as other toys might. But as long as I’m there to keep handing it back to her after she tosses it over her head while she’s laying down, it works for a while. Still a good toy. She hasn’t started teething quite yet but she does put it in her mouth a lot so maybe she will grow in to it here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness

customer_reviews.title: This is a colorful and light weight toy for baby
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the reaction of my grandbaby to this toy. She was nine months old and it scared her and she wanted nothing to do with it. Two months later and we get the same response. However, it seems like it would be easy to hold and teethe on if the baby is not afraid of the "busyness" of it. Our Grandson the same age as the little girl wants nothing to do with it either. So far not one of three babies will play with it.
customer_reviews.author: LAWonder10

customer_reviews.title: It is a good buy for baby!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old is just starting to get into this toy. She mostly is making it a game of her chucking it and me retrieving it for her (she smiles and giggles when she does it so I know she likes the "game"). Even her jelous 2yr old brother will play with her (usually he will just steal whatever she has lol). She does occasionally stick it her mouth but not too often, yet.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaLinnae

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the hype is about. Baby doesn’t seem interested and I’ve had it for several months. She’s going on 7 months old now and is very active with her other toys....so I’ll give it a bit more time, but I won’t hold my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Sand

customer_reviews.title: Instant favorite
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toy for my 4 month old granddaughter who is teething and wants to bite on everything for some relief. She immediately loved it! The material is more thin rubber rather than plastic, making it easy for her to grab/hold and bite on. The bright colors are fun for her as well. I have washed this on the top shelf of my dishwasher and it cam out fine. I did remove it before the drying cycle went on in case it was too hot. I definitely would recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, beware when washing
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! She has been played with this toy since 3 months old. It is well done and with quality. I do not put 5 stars because the center opened after the first wash with hot water (not boiling water!) and since then everytime I wash it gets water inside. Manufacturer should consider change this because this is a theeter toy, it has to be well cleaned and babies usually throw them to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Devi

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating, multiple uses, safe, and fun for babies
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing and it is useful for learning grasping, ability to affect ones environment (if I do X, Y will happen), passing from hand to hand, etc. It’s soft and flexible so he can’t easily hurt himself (or me) when he waves it and flings it haphazardly.. and it’s not the kind of plastic or silicone that seemingly attracts all possible lint and hair in the environment- this thing doesn’t get gross easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for grasping!
customer_reviews.text: My son is just not getting the hang of grasping and this toys is great! It has multiple rings on it so when he grabs at it he has many to choose from. It also rattles which he enjoys. If your kiddo is not yet up to grasping level, thats ok! At one point he put his face against the toy and began chewing on the ring and it worked perfect for the lazy boy!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rossow

customer_reviews.title: a wonder toy for sure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. She'll toss it, chew on it, shake it, look at it, basically anything she wants to do. It's wonderful to put on her lap in the car seat. it really does keep her occupied. She's currently 17 weeks and has been playing with it for weeks now. I think it's a personal goal of hers to chew on every corner of that thing. The cleaning of is not that hard. I take a wipe and go by color.
customer_reviews.author: first time mom life

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething!
customer_reviews.text: Great teething and sensory toy! The design makes it easy for my baby to grab, hold, and chew on. My daughter started playing with this when she was 4 mo's old. She's 5 mo's now and loves it! The only con is that it's kind of big...so it's a little awkward to play with if your baby is small, other than that it's a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The life of the daycare!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this was my daughter's absolute favorite toy for about two months. She is now almost eight months and has moved on to other toys. The is great for teething or for little ones that simply like to chew on things. It is easy to clean and it is easy to hold. It has a soft rattle sound. This toy went "missing' frequently at my daughter's daycare because all of the kids ages 3-10 months loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Roaringqueen

customer_reviews.title: Both of my kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my first kid, and he's now 4. I bought another for my second, who's 1 and still plays with his. It has great colors, it's resilient, and most importantly, it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cavnar

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and teether
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our two month old grandson and he immediately was able to grasp it and even was able to also grab with the second hand too. Saw him trying to put it in his mouth, and I know he will get the hang of it soon as he starts chewing on things. Like the width/ circumference of it because it gives him room to hold it with two hands and also put it in his mouth at same time. Rattle is small and pretty quiet, no too loud. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big hit in our home. Got it when the baby was 3 months old and he still plays with it regularly. My only complaint is that it's a pain to wipe down and I'm afraid to just submerge it because I worry about water getting trapp d in the center rattle part and growing mold. But the frustration of wiping down a dozen little squiggly bars is worth it for a happy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Uninteresting
customer_reviews.text: I bought it based on everyone else's reviews but it just didn't spark the same interest in my little one who has been teething like crazy. Maybe she'll be interested in it later but not so much right now.
customer_reviews.author: kcl0v3

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: Mybaby absolutly loves this toy! She started using it at about 3 months and has been obsessed, we takr it with her anywhere she goes because it calms her down and distracts her instantly. It is super easy for her to grab and play with and the light weight and noise aspects make it more fun for her. I HIGHLY recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to clean, safe, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy, and so does my little one!!! My baby got teeth at 4 months old and was teething at 2 or 2.5 months. The problem was she couldn't hold onto a lot of the toys to chew on because she would smash them into her face and hurt herself :( This toy is VERY soft, squishy, and flexible so she could safely chew on it and not harm herself. If it gets dirty or covered in spit/spit up I can very easily just wash it in the sink with warm water and dish soap :) It is a cheap, easy, safe, effective, and enjoyable toy for any baby as they start teething and playing. 100% recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this toy, and PT approves
customer_reviews.text: We go to PT for my little one, and our PT says this is a good toy for getting her to get her hands up above her chest- she has a tendency to let them flop to the ground at her sides, but she likes holding this and putting it to her mouth. We like using it for the changing table, car seat, etc. For cleaning, I just wiped it off as recommended. I didn't submerge it because I thought it could trap moisture in the block in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: David Copsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's FAVORITE toy! She's 6 months old and she has been "playing" with it for the last month and she can actually hold it because it's light and if she does drop it, she can grab it from any angle and it's easy for her to pick it up and chew on it! She LOVES LOVES LOVES it! It's now going to be my baby shower gift for any upcoming babies!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh. She's just not that into it.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old is not interested in this toy. She prefers a set of 8 rattles that came in an oversized plastic baby bottle instead. The rattle is pretty weak in this toy and you have to shake it pretty vigorously to make it work. She can grab the ring things easily, but I think she doesn't like how her little hands almost get tangled up because there are so many. It's kind of like holding a partially unraveled ball of yarn whereas she wants to hold and explore one solid object at a time. The more distinct of a noise it makes, the better. My 2yo loves to try to get her to play with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Joli.viedamour

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for a younger baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of toys for my 5 month old baby for a long car trip. I noticed this had excellent reviews, but my little one was just not interested. I've shown it to her a few times and if she does choose to grab it, she quickly loses interest and throws it on the floor. Funny because she does still like some rattles and other simple toys, but this one doesn't do it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but box was opened and damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but I wouldn't buy from this seller. I bought it as a gift since my daughter liked hers so much. The box had clearly been opened and was damaged. This is extra bad during a pandemic. I wasn't able to use it as a gift. While it's a great product, you want to make sure you get something that is new.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite toy from the first week!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this toy! This was the first thing she grasped with her hands, which happened so early I don't remember her ever not grasping it. I believe I ordered it the first week she came home. I'm so glad I bought this. I almost did not buy it because it is made in China but people spoke highly of the company so I took a chance (I've been mostly getting wooden toys from Haba - made in Germany). I highly recommend it. My daughter plays with it everyday (she's now two months and a half).
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Multi-functional toy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for babies that are learning to grasp and pinch! Easy to hold and grip as it isn’t heavy also it rattles so it can grab your little one’s attention when he shakes it. My son is 8 months old and loves this! He is teething now so it goes in his mouth! It’s also easy to clean and the bright colors makes it very attractive for baby. Needless to say it’s a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 7 months and still loves to play with this. It was one of the first toys she could just stick her hand through and have it "stuck" to bring to her mouth, and now she can reach for it and easily grab the sides. She loves to chew on it, shake it and now throw it. It's very durable, and I never worry about giving it to her to keep her occupied and having her choke or suffocate. I've purchased them for others too because it's such a great beginner toy!
customer_reviews.author: RA523

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller kids!
customer_reviews.text: One of the few toys that is small enough to grip, yet interesting enough to hold their attention! My son was born early, so at 3 months his hands are still relatively small, but he was bored and trying to grasp at toys only to find the handle too large. This is perfect. The tubes are just the right size for little hands and mouths, the center rattles, and it's light weight & soft enough for babies to easily wave around without bashing hard plastic into their face.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby enjoyed this toy. I bought it for her when she was 3 months old. It was easy for her to grab/hold and wave around. Plus, it is made of soft plastic which meant when she got so excited and shook it right into her face it didn’t hurt. I highly recommend this toy. I would buy it again for myself or as gift for someone with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: No textures for teething
customer_reviews.text: My baby is pretty indifferent to this toy. Doesn’t have many textures for teething so he doesn’t use it for that. There are other toys out there that have different textures that he prefers. It’s cute though- easy to hold and has a little bit of a rattle.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, loves it
customer_reviews.text: My LO is 6 months old and he been playing with this winkel for 4 weeks now. He loves it, it has bright colors and everytime he sees it he goes for it. It's easy for him to carry around, pick up, and he even likes to throw it. There is a tiny little bell in the middle which makes him love shaking it. It makes for a good teether too. I highly recommend this toy to any parent with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Deaton

customer_reviews.title: 3 month old loves!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this so far! Our 3 month old is just starting to really grab things and he loves this! It immediately catches his attention, with it's bright colors and rattle. I love the rattle too because it's not a harsh sound and isn't as annoying as other rattles. The tubing of the toy is flexible too so it's not hard and I think will be good for teething when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin D.

customer_reviews.title: His favorite toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this!! It’s easy to grab and fun to chew. This helped him tremendously when he first started to learn how to grab things. He could grab any other of his toys because his grip wasn’t that strong yet and this toy had made it so much easier and fun for him. Easily one of his favorite toys now. He’s not teething yet and so far he chew on this with my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Celery

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this! At first my 3 month old daughter didn't have a clue what to do with it so we had to show her how to grip the toy and after about a week she is able to grip it on her own. She is able to bring it to her mouth to chew on it as well as we believe she is starting to teeth. Would recommend. We wash and cleans it routinely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby not interested
customer_reviews.text: I should have known my baby wouldn't be interested...because he's 8 months and likes anything that's not his toys...but this toy he barely cares for...even though it seems like something he'd love! He doesn't chew on it either...this was a bust for me, but maybe not for you're baby! Maybe 8 months is too old?
customer_reviews.author: Ellen J

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Find
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and liked what people had to say so I took a shot and bought for a friend. Since I had no idea how good it would be I only bought one (she has twin babies). It was a hit. It's easy to hold and perfect for little hands. They liked it so much I purchased another so they each have their own. It is the one toy their mom packs for every road trip.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: 3 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My three month old loves this! It's the first toy she's shown real interest in and it's perfect for her - she can grab it, it's flexible, small enough for her to fit in her mouth but big shaped so she doesn't gag/choke, light enough she can whip it around. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bleating Squid

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Son is 7 months old, has been using this rattle since about 3 months. He has always loved it, it is very easy for him to hold on to. He has met his milestones of grasping and reaching for objects, passing them from hand to hand. He only has 2 teeth, but it hasnt been damaged by his chomping efforts. Would recommend and buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: 4 Month old Loves This Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Little man had zero interest in this toy until he hit 4 months. Suddenly, it was the coolest thing ever! Stick it in his mouth, gnaw on the rubber loopdy things, shake it, throw it, yell about it, whatever!! I can drive 30 minutes while he sits in his carseat mouthing it and telling me about it. The colors amuse him and it's easy for him to grasp so it doesn't frustrate him. It seems pretty durable and is easy to clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Not all babies love it though
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item with high expectation as everybody says that their babies love it. But to our disappointment, our baby never did... She was definitely interested, and tried every time to grab and chew it. But not sure whether it's because of the design or something else, she almost could never find the right angle to bite it and that really frustrated her... And at the end we put it in the microwave steam box and it got destroyed... For us it was a sad story @@
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: My son did not particularly enjoy this....
customer_reviews.text: My son had played with the Manhattan Toy Skwish Classic Rattle and Teether Grasping Activity Toy at daycare, and I noticed that he liked it a lot, so I wanted to buy it for him. When I came to Amazon to find it, I noticed this similar toy and decided to buy this instead because I figured it was dishwasher safe, making cleaning of it easier than a wooden one. Unfortunately, however, my son did not enjoy it nearly as much as the wooden version. He doesn't use it as a teether, but holds it in his hands for a few minutes before tossing it aside. We didn't get much use out of it....
customer_reviews.author: MelissaM

customer_reviews.title: Enticing teething toy/crawling motivation
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I expected based on the pictures but definitely appropriately sized for a baby. The teething tubes were soft and appealing for our 8 month old and the rattle sound and bright colors were enticing her to reach for it as she works on crawling. Loved it! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Becca & Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grasp
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our baby looking for something she could grasp easily and chew on. She had no problems grasping it, but it did take her awhile to be able to chew on it. She preferred the rings we also purchased her to this for teething, but seemed to enjoy using this as a toy - which it is. It took a little longer to clean than most of her other toys, but I didn’t feel like that was a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: P. Isner

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your little one
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old basically hasn't put this down since I bought it! She loves holding onto it and chewing on it way more than the dozen or so other teething toys we've bought or been given. She is mesmerized by the shape and bright colors. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily L

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOY MY KID WILL NOT PUT DOWN!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first my 9 month old was like, "what the hell is this?" and wasn't that interested. But after leaving it near her on the bed, etc, she now loves it! It's easy for her to grab, gnaw on, shake up and down(center is a rattle), etc. She also likes to grab the cloth cube in the middle. Easy to clean with a Purell wipe or similar. Scary how many parents on here are idiots. One put it in the dishwasher and it melted. Another steamed it with the same result. It's an awesome toy that I would definitely give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: drforbin

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic toy. It seems to keep my kid entertained ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic toy. It seems to keep my kid entertained in many different ways. It rattles, it's soft/chewy/gummy, it's multi-colored, it's got all these things you can grab and pull on, you can throw it, you can wash it off easily, he plays with it in the bath/yard/car/beach/everywhere. It looks cool, we buy one for everyone at every baby shower because it's cheap and you can tell them it'll make their baby a genius. But even if that doesn't work out for them, they will appreciate the time it entertained the wee one.
customer_reviews.author: Chuansu L.

customer_reviews.title: Expected baby to like it more
customer_reviews.text: I really expected my baby to love this. We got it for him at 8 months and now at 13 months, he has really barely touched it. He puts everything in his mouth to chew so by looking at the design of this, i though he would love it. Not sure what it is, but it's just not really for him i guess. It does seem like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Probably best for a little younger tyke.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great. It has so many places where a little one can grab on it and fling it around. My son is 6 months and doesn't really show too much interest in it. I don't know if that is his age or that he is a little beyond the toy. When he does grab it, it goes right into his mouth and it appears he is looking for something a little more substantial to chew on. My sisters little one had this around at around 4 months and she took to it a lot better. She appeared to work hard to grab at it and had a lot of success because of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Snow

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves this ... easy to clean and maintain. I read some really bad comments about mold, but I guess they didn’t use it properly. Just wash it with water and mild detergent as any other toy which your kid would put in his mouth ... very happy with my purchase. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Buyer :)

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, doesn’t work as a teether for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product out of desperation for a baby that hates pacifiers and teethers. It also is not liked for teething but my baby loves throwing it and watching it bounce and make noise. Probably for the best because I was concerned about mold growing in areas that I could not clean.
customer_reviews.author: NewFish

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite toys for tiny ones.
customer_reviews.text: I run a daycare and I absolutly love this ball as it is so easy for little ones to not only grab, but hold on to as they learn to grab onto things. It also has a rattle to it, so they are intregued with the sounds as well. I would highly recommend for little ones as it will keep them entertained for a while (Put a chain link on it and link it to like a carseat...and you will keep them going for a long time). This really is one of my go to toys for babies and one of my all time favorite ones.
customer_reviews.author: smllchng

customer_reviews.title: Great toy design!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my grandson’s first toys. I purchased it based on the reviews and it has been one of his most favorite toys. It is light weight and so he doesn’t hurt himself with it when his little arms uncontrollably fling it around. He can grab it easily because of all of the loops. It is colorful and it keeps him interested. It travels with him in his car seat. This is a great baby toy design!
customer_reviews.author: GardenGal44

customer_reviews.title: They are ok toys
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I thought, price a little high compare the one later I find in the store
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: Easy l grip toy, soft plastic, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I keep this toy attached to my daughters car seat because she’s always wanting to hold onto something. It’s a great size and lightweight so she’s not uncomfortable holding it in her lap for long periods. Very easy to grip all around. She doesn’t care to shake it or chew on it but the rattle isn’t loud which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Winkel Rattle & Sensory Teether Toy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our Grandson after talking to one of our good friends. For something so simple, it works well. He was immediately drawn to it, & loved playing with it. He was teething, & didn't take to the standard type teething rings. This did the job! It was simple to maintain & keep clean
customer_reviews.author: M l D

customer_reviews.title: A miss for us, but quality and quickly shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Easy for baby to grip, fun colors, so I was excited. My 5 month old spent 3 seconds looking at it and was over it, which is in no way seller's fault! The only stars I took away were for easy-to-clean. Cleaning that thing was like cleaning a spiderweb made out of straws crumpled in a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Smidge

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorites
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for a friends baby and they liked it so much I got one for my own. Ithas been one of my sons favorites. We have it and the Skwish out pretty much every day. When he was new, he liked to hear the noise it made when we shook it for him. The shape made it one of the first toys he was able to grab and manipulate. It’s light and bendybsobhe can’t hurt himself with it. The square shape lets me put it on his belly for him to grab and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysha

customer_reviews.title: BIG but good teether
customer_reviews.text: Very cumbersome, but I like that it is grippable for little hands. The vibrant colors, abstract design & rattle are interesting enough to keep baby occupied. A little awkward to clean because of the twisty design. Unfortunately, MY baby is not impressed, but I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncusty

customer_reviews.title: Best Infant Toy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our baby when he was about 3 months old and it has been a hit! He LOVES this toy. It’s super easy for him to hold and it keeps him entertained. We always have it near. This was a good purchase. Some toys can be hit or miss but this one was a success for sure. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sasha N

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes holding this toy.
customer_reviews.text: My baby granddaughter (3 months old) enjoys this wacky-looking thing. It’s easy for her to grasp in her little fingers. She’ll be able to chomp on it when she begins teething. It’s bright, beautiful colors, and can go in the dishwasher if that’s what you want to do. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Zendzian

customer_reviews.title: Simple teether, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy for my six month old to maneuver. He loves waving it around and chewing on it. He can grasp it easily but sometime later gets frustrated that he can’t get it in his mouth due to the shape of he doesn’t hold it just right. Super easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: mkidwel2

product_meta.title: Manhattan Toy Winkel Rattle & Sensory Teether Toy
product_meta.description: Style:Original WinkelTime Honored Classic The Winkel rattle and teether, by Manhattan Toy, is an award-winning classic, a true “must have” for parents and infants. Its maze of soft, continuous tubes and its stunning colors instantly capture and hold baby’s attention. The mesmerizing loop design and lightweight construction make it very easy for little hands to grab, hold and rattle – a perfect clutching toy to engage baby’s gross motor skills. The center cube features a quiet rattle so baby can explore sound and cause and effect. The soft, pliable loops are BPA-free for teething or gumming babies. Winkel can also be refrigerated to provide a more soothing experience for particularly sore baby gums and teeth. Winkel’s patented design and developmental features have made it a baby favorite, parent “go to” for over 25 years. Since 1979, Manhattan Toy has been making award-winning, high quality, educational toys for your baby, toddler or kid. From infant toys and baby toys to sensory development toys, our goal is to provide the safest and best toys available. All of our products, from the newest concepts to our time-tested classics, are innovatively designed to inspire imaginative play and are routinely safety tested to pass strict CPSC, ASTM, EN71 and Health Canada safety standards.
feature_bullets: This mesmerizing maze of safe, soft, continuous tubes is a perfect baby teething toy
Infant toy promotes clutching and two-handed play; middle cube contains a pleasing rattle sound
Multiple newborn toy award winner, including the Oppenheim Toy Portfolio Blue Chip Award
Safe, teethable plastic loops are BPA free
Baby teether suitable for ages 0-24 months; Do not boil or steam clean; Hand wash only

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars11,678 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
